articles.author: Hannah Osborne
articles.title: Supervolcano 'megabeds' discovered at bottom of sea point to catastrophic events in Europe every 10000 to 15000 years - Livescience.com
articles.description: Four huge deposits from supervolcano eruptions over the last 40,000 years have been discovered at the bottom of the Mediterranean Sea.
articles.content:
Scientists have discovered "megabeds" at the bottom of the ocean that appear to have been fomed by ancient supervolcano eruptions. (Image credit: Vershinin-M/Getty Images)
